text: Your Wednesday Evening BriefingHere’s what you need to know at the end of the day.
Listen to ‘The Daily’The president, the Postal Service and the election.
In the ‘Parenting’ NewsletterWhat it means to home-school.

After years of watching President Trump demolish his achievements, former President Barack Obama has almost as much at stake in the race as Joe Biden.On the line for Mr. Obama is not just a chance to restore what Mr. Trump abandoned, but also to rewrite the narrative about America and its values.
Some die-hard Democratic delegates are longing for an in-person event.
Kamala Harris’s lawyer husband is adoring on Instagram, proud of telling their love story and seems to relish life as a campaign spouse.
Our critic asks: What have American voters and political commentators learned in 36 years from Geraldine Ferraro to Sarah Palin to Kamala Harris?

Trump administration officials recently gave a classified briefing about the F-35 stealth fighter to the United Arab Emirates military, despite concerns among national security officials. Suhaimi Abdullah/Getty Images

Trump Phone Calls Add to Lingering Questions About Russian InterferenceA Senate committee went further than the Mueller report on key points about Russia’s election sabotage operations and the Trump campaign.

Opening of U.S. Schools Brings Strike Threats and New Virus CasesAs colleges rethink reopening plans, school districts are discovering positive cases and are improvising quarantines. Here’s the latest.
Local Chinese Officials Hid Virus’s Dangers From Beijing, U.S. FindsAn intelligence report said top officials in Beijing were in the dark in early January on the true dangers of the virus.
Big-Box retailers’ profits are surging during the pandemic.

Facebook Removes 790 QAnon Groups to Fight Conspiracy TheoryThe social network also said it was restricting another 1,950 groups and more than 10,000 accounts on Instagram related to the conspiracy group.
What Is QAnon, the Viral Pro-Trump Conspiracy Theory?Explaining the “big tent conspiracy theory” that falsely claims that President Trump is facing down a shadowy cabal of Democratic pedophiles.
Big Tech’s Domination of Business Reaches New HeightsAs the economy contracts and many companies struggle to survive, tech giants are amassing wealth and influence in ways unseen in decades.

Fires, Blackouts, a Heat Wave and a Pandemic: California’s Horrible MonthThe nation’s most-populated state is facing multiple crises, including 23 major wildfires raging and a daily virus death toll above 100.
See what photographers are capturing on the ground in California.
Pfc. Alexander Jenkins Jr. (back left, in glasses) and Pfc. Roy L. Barnwell (far right) were targets of racial bias aboard the U.S.S. Sumter. From Bart Lubow

After years of watching President Trump demolish his achievements, former President Barack Obama has almost as much at stake in the race as Joe Biden.On the line for Mr. Obama is not just a chance to restore what Mr. Trump abandoned, but also to rewrite the narrative about America and its values.
As a barrier-breaking candidate, and as the running mate to a 77-year-old, Kamala Harris carries an extraordinary set of hopes and expectations from the party.
Kamala Harris’s lawyer husband is adoring on Instagram, proud of telling their love story and seems to relish life as a campaign spouse.
